column6: p.r.; P.b.k. at 310 nm in N$_2$-satd. soln. contg. 2 mol L$^{-1}$ tert-BuOH and 2-5 $\times$ 10$^{-3}$ mol L$^{-1}$ benzylamine.

column7: p.r.; D.k. at 700 nm in soln. contg. tert-BuOH; ~10% deamination and 90% addn.
